html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-05732024-05-24ECCC
ActFisheries Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Wastewater Systems Effluent Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the WASTEWATER SYSTEMS EFFLUENT REGULATIONS in order to (1) allow eligible owners and operators of wastewater systems another opportunity to receive an extension to upgrade their system; (2) expand temporary bypass authorizations to apply to all planned releases in the wastewater infrastructure, at treatment plants and within the collection system; (3) apply a risk-based approach to the planning, evaluating and authorization of these releases; and (4) address administrative and operational challenges.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0097 Publication Date: 2024-06-05
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations Amending the WASTEWATER SYSTEMS EFFLUENT REGULATIONS in order to (1) allow eligible owners and operators of wastewater systems another opportunity to receive an extension to upgrade their system; (2) expand temporary bypass authorizations to apply to all planned releases in the wastewater infrastructure, at treatment plants and within the collection system; (3) apply a risk-based approach to the planning, evaluating and authorization of these releases; and (4) address administrative and operational challenges.
